part.title: Salad
part.step: Preheat oven to 200C. Chop veggies into 3-5 cm pieces. Combine veggies, Rosemary, garlic and 1/4 cup olive oil and mix well with your hands. Place in oven for 30-40 minutes (or until cooked and browning slightly.)

Meanwhile heat remaining oil in pan and add buckwheat. Cook for 4 minutes and stir continuously. Add stock and bring to the boil. Reduce to a simmer, put a lid on pan and cook for 15 minutes or until most of the stock is absorbed.

To prepare sprinkle spinach and rocket over a platter, then sprinkle 1/2 of the buckwheat on top. Place roasted veggies on top, then sprinkle remaining buckwheat over the veggies. Lastly drizzle dressing over and scatter a few lemon wedges on the side. Serve with meat if desired or just alone. Very delicious, the entire family went back for seconds!

part.step: add all ingredients togetherand mix well (season if desired.)
